INNOTECH VIETNAM 
Senior Software Engineer 
Project Name: ACB Banking 
Client From: Vietnam 
Description: Build application on Internet and Mobile Banking 
Technical 
-Web Service, Microservice 
-Spring boot,JPA,Elasticsearch,Google API 
Services,RabbitMq -PostgreSQL,MySQL,Oracle 
Main responsibilities: 
- Developing and maintaining the back-end functionality of system. 
- Participating in discussions with clients to clarify what they want. 
- Designing patterns for project if required. 
- Contacting external team to confirm info of requirement. 
- Coding review. 
- Document Service. 
OMART VIETNAM 
Senior Software Engineer 
Project Name: e-commerce 
Client From: Vietnam 
Description: application for e-commerce, Web,Mobile 
Technical 
-Web Service 
-Spring boot,JPA,Twilio, Fire Base,Elasticsearch,Google 
API Services -My SQL 
Main responsibilities: 
-I am responsible a development REST API backend. 
-Document API for integrate with Front-end Web and Mobile. 
-Testing Service 
-Code review 
-Make sure deliver on time to production. 
CSC VIETNAM (DXC VIETNAM) 
Senior Software Engineer 
Project Name: SAP Portal Java 
Client From: Canada 
Description: enterprise portal for aircraft manufacturing industry 
Technical: 
- Web Dynpro Java 7.4 
2013 
2014 
- Hibernate, JPA, EJB 
- DB: Oracle 
Main responsibilities: 
-Upgrade to new version base on available application -
Interaction and Communication with onshore team 
-Help other members to keep up with the software development progress

Project Name: TLS 
Client From: Singapore 
Description: Telecoms licensing system of Singapore government 
Technical: 
-Struts 1,2 
-IBatis 
-Server: Weblogic 
-DB: Oracle 
Main responsibilities: 
-Development and enhancement from existing 
application -Maintain application after release. -
Help other members fix bug. 
-Working with QC team and report task to project manager. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Project Name: MOH 
Client From: Singapore 
Description: Ministry of Health Singapore government 
Technical: 
-Spring Boot Web Service Restfull API, JPA, Hibernate. 
-Angular 1 (front-end) 
-Server: Weblogic 
-DB: Oracle,H2 for dev 
Main responsibilities: 
-Development from Scratch base on requirements from QA. 
-Working with BA,QC to clarify requirement from onshore team. 
-Receive feedback from QC,QA to update requirement, fix bug if needed 
- Review business rules from other member after completed 
- Reporting task to project manager 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description: Building Highly Education 
Application Technical:

device Main responsibilities: 
-Development from Scratch base on requirements 
from onshore. -Working directly onshore team to clarify 
requirements -Report task to onshore leader.
